snippet: ADP, a payroll processor, said U.S. companies added 213,000 jobs last month, a decent increase though also the smallest in four months.
lead_paragraph: ADP, a payroll processor, said U.S. companies added 213,000 jobs last month, a decent increase though also the smallest in four months.

headline.main: Survey Shows 213,000 Jobs Added in January, Echoing Outlook for Growth
headline.print_headline: Survey Shows 213,000 Jobs Added in January, Echoing Outlook for Growth
